titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the manufacturing deduction provided by the American Jobs Creation Act of 2004 with respect to income attributable to domestic production activities in Puerto Rico.

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the manufacturing deduction provided by the American Jobs Creation Act of 2004 with respect to income attributable to domestic production activities in Puerto Rico.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers engaged in domestic production activities in Puerto Rico the tax deduction for income attributable to domestic production activities.
